name: ULevelEditorSubsystem
doc:
ULevelEditorSubsystem
Subsystem for exposing Level Editor related functionality to scripts

OnMapChanged: Expose MapChanged to blueprints. Note: This executes too early for some editor scripting, consider using OnMapOpened if this doesn't work for you.

methods.name: BuildLightMaps
GetCurrentLevel
methods.doc:
Get the current level used by the world editor.
@return       The current level

methods.name: GetSelectionSet
methods.doc:
Get the selection set for the current world, you can use this to track
and create changes to the level editor's selection

methods.name: LoadLevel
NewLevel
NewLevelFromTemplate
SaveAllDirtyLevels
methods.doc:
Saves all Level currently loaded by the World Editor.
@return      True if the operation succeeds.

methods.name: SaveCurrentLevel
methods.doc:
Saves the specified Level. Must already be saved at lease once to have a valid path.
@return      True if the operation succeeds.

methods.name: SetCurrentLevelByName
